mapper.insert: insert into empCoupon (COUPON_NUM, COUPON_CODE, COUPON_NAME, DISCOUNT_TYPE , EXPIRATION_DATE, DISCOUNT_RATE, COUPON_NOTE, EMP_NUM) values(#{couponNum}, #{couponCode}, #{couponName}, #{discountType} , #{expirationDate}, #{discountRate}, #{couponNote}, #{empNum} )

insert into ownerCoupon (COUPON_NUM, COUPON_CODE, COUPON_NAME, DISCOUNT_TYPE , EXPIRATION_DATE, DISCOUNT_RATE, COUPON_NOTE, OWNER_NUM) values(#{couponNum}, #{couponCode}, #{couponName}, #{discountType} , #{expirationDate}, #{discountRate}, #{couponNote}, #{ownerNum} )
mapper.delete: delete from empCoupon where EMP_NUM = #{userNum} and COUPON_NUM = #{couponNum}
delete from ownerCoupon where OWNER_NUM = #{userNum} and COUPON_NUM = #{couponNum}
mapper.insert: insert into memberCoupon (MEM_NUM, COUPON_NUM, COUPON_REGIST_DATE) values (#{memNum}, #{couponNum}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: select mem_num as memNum, m.coupon_num as couponNum, coupon_regist_date as couponRegistDate, coupon_status as couponStatus, coupon_code as couponCode, coupon_name as couponName, discount_type as discountType, expiration_date as expirationDate, discount_rate as discountRate , coupon_note as couponNote, emp_num as empNum from memberCoupon m join empCoupon e on e.coupon_Num = m.coupon_Num where mem_num = #{memNum} union select mem_num as memNum, m.coupon_num as couponNum, coupon_regist_date as couponRegistDate, coupon_status as couponStatus, coupon_code as couponCode, coupon_name as couponName, discount_type as discountType, expiration_date as expirationDate, discount_rate as discountRate , coupon_note as couponNote, owner_num as ownerNum from memberCoupon m join ownerCoupon o on o.coupon_Num = m.coupon_Num where mem_num = #{memNum}
select '발급된 쿠폰' from memberCoupon where coupon_num = #{couponNum} and mem_num = #{memNum}
